author: Staff Reporter
text:
As part of National Population Register verification works, officials will make door-to-door visits in the corporation limits.

A press release from Corporation Commissioner K.R. Selvaraj said that linking of Aadhaar number with the NPR is currently under way and the process is expected to be completed by February 5. Data collectors will visit each household to check for data authenticity. Residents can verify details such as Aadhaar number, date of birth, name of parents, address and details of family members and correct errors. They can also provide their mobile number and family card number to the data collectors while they visit the households. The names of the deceased should be removed and details of newborns should be added to the list, Mr. Selvaraj added.

The residents are asked to keep necessary documents with them. The work has been taken up under the Citizenship Act, 1955 and the Citizenship Rules, 2003.
title: NPR verification under way in Salem
